Part of the relavant ant build.xml:

<property name="excluded.props" 
value="${basedir}/commerce/junit/runner/excluded.properties" />
<property name="classpath"  
value="${weblogic.jar};${excluded.props};${junit.jar};>


That should work right?

Alternatively
On the system classpath,
should it point to the parent directory befor junit or should it 
point to the full path up to the excluded.properties file?
